In England, in the seven days to 31 July, there were 160,411 new confirmed cases (283.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 July, there were 211,562 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 24% (51,151 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 August is 5,225,224 (9,240 cases per 100,000 population).
